name: Clif Bar Dark Chocolate Almond with Sea Salt
categories: Dark Chocolate Almond with Sea Salt
description:
Clif’s new Sweet and Salty line taps into that irresistible flavour combination that always seems to taste like more. Blending rich dark chocolate with lightly toasted almonds and a hint of sea salt, this bar delivers enjoyable energy.Ingredients: brown rice syrup, rolled oats, soy protein isolate, cane syrup, roasted soybeans, rice flour, almonds, cane sugar, cocoa, soy flour, unsweetened chocolate, high oleic sunflower oil, oat fibre, alkalized cocoa, unsweetened chocolate, cane sugar, natural flavours, sea salt, cocoa butter, salt, cocoa butter, barley malt extract, soy lecithin, tocopherols.70% organic ingredients.Contains: almond, barley, oats and soyMay contain: peanuts, other tree nuts, milk, rye, triticale and wheat.
